title: 2016 Spring Amateur Event Internship - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: 2016 Spring Amateur Event Internship Pro Sports Amateur Event intern will assist the Amateur Event Director with all of our Foundation events.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
